AzureAd.TenantId: [Enter the Tenant Id (Directory ID obtained from the Azure portal), e.g. 72f988bf-86f1-41af-91ab-2d7cd011db47]
AzureAd.ClientId: [Enter the Client Id (Application ID obtained from the Azure portal), e.g. ba74781c2-53c2-442a-97c2-3d60re42f403]
AzureAd.ClientSecret: [Enter the Client Secret (obtained from the Azure Portal - NOT the Secret Id), It should look something like: DKJ8Q!6RHasrp4WzDvV3Sl7latXs.XbybIxiEtTl

AOI_DEPLOYMODEL: Replace with your Azure Open AI Deployment model
AOI_ENDPOINT: Replace witu your Azurew Open AI Enpoint. STOP at the .com , Example - https://aidev.openai.azure.com
EMBEDDINGS_DEPLOYMODEL: Replace with the deployment name of your Embeddings model
GEOCODING_API_KEY: Replace with your Geocoding API Key
AI_SEARCH_URL: Replace with your AI Search URI
AI_SEARCH_KEY: Replace with your AI Search API Key
